sentences.sentence: This paper presents the operating principle of a new lateral shearing interferometer.
sentences.translation: 本文介绍了一种新型横向剪切干涉仪的工作原理。

sentences.sentence: A year later, so did the ground-based Degree Angular Scale Interferometer at the South Pole.
sentences.translation: 一年以后，位于南极的陆基角度度量干涉仪也做了同样的测量。

sentences.sentence: Another interferometer with arms of the same length is under construction at Kamioka in Japan.
sentences.translation: 另一个拥有同样长度激光干涉管臂的项目于日本的神岗正在建设之中。
